languages.text: "К тому моменту все старшие офицеры были мертвы, и я возглавил своих людей в штыковой атаке. Мы преподали кровавый урок ксеносам, а затем... Конец боя я не помню. Пришел в себя я уже в этом скверном месте, обезоруженный и на грани смерти. Я думал, что умру, но Император еще не отпустил меня со службы".

"By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."
languages.original_text: "К тому моменту все старшие офицеры были мертвы, и я возглавил своих людей в штыковой атаке. Мы преподали кровавый урок ксеносам, а затем... Конец боя я не помню. Пришел в себя я уже в этом скверном месте, обезоруженный и на грани смерти. Я думал, что умру, но Император еще не отпустил меня со службы".

I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from service."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “那个时候，我们的上级军官都已经阵亡了。于是我带着我的人冲上去拼刺刀，用鲜血给那些异形上了一课。在那之后……我不记得那场战斗是怎么结束的了。我在这个肮脏的地方醒了过来，被缴了械，奄奄一息。我本以为我会一命呜呼，但看来，帝皇并不打算让我结束服役。”
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，我们的上级军官都已经阵亡了。于是我带着我的人冲上去拼刺刀，用鲜血给那些异形上了一课。在那之后……我不记得那场战斗是怎么结束的了。我在这个肮脏的地方醒了过来，被缴了械，奄奄一息。我本以为我会一命呜呼，但看来，帝皇并不打算让我结束服役。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「そのときすでに上官は倒れていたので、私は部下を率いて銃剣突撃を開始しました。我々は異種族どもを完膚なきまでに叩きのめしたはずなのですが…戦いがどのような結末を迎えたのか、まったく覚えていないのです。気が付くとこの汚い場所にいて、武装は解かれ、死の淵に立たされていました。ここまでかと思いましたが、まだ皇帝に仕えるべきと彼が判断してくださったようです」
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: 「そのときすでに上官は倒れていたので、私は部下を率いて銃剣突撃を開始しました。我々は異種族どもを完膚なきまでに叩きのめしたはずなのですが…戦いがどのような結末を迎えたのか、まったく覚えていないのです。気が付くとこの汚い場所にいて、武装は解かれ、死の淵に立たされていました。ここまでかと思いましたが、まだ皇帝に仕えるべきと彼が判断してくださったようです」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Para entonces, nuestros oficiales superiores ya habían caído, de modo que lideré a los míos en una carga de bayonetas. Dimos una lección sangrienta a los xenos, pero después... no recuerdo cómo acabó la batalla. Desperté en este abyecto lugar, desarmado y al borde de la muerte. Pensé que iba a morir, pero aún no era el momento de que el Emperador me liberara de Su servicio».
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: «Para entonces, nuestros oficiales superiores ya habían caído, de modo que lideré a los míos en una carga de bayonetas. Dimos una lección sangrienta a los xenos, pero después... no recuerdo cómo acabó la batalla. Desperté en este abyecto lugar, desarmado y al borde de la muerte. Pensé que iba a morir, pero aún no era el momento de que el Emperador me liberara de Su servicio».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

languages.text: « À ce moment-là, comme nos officiers supérieurs étaient tombés au combat, j'ai pris le commandement et j'ai lancé une charge à la baïonnette. Nous avons fait payer aux xénos le prix du sang, mais... j'ignore comment la bataille s'est terminée, je n'ai aucun souvenir de ce qu'il s'est passé ensuite. Je suis revenu à moi ici, dans ce lieu infâme, désarmé et aux portes de la mort. J'ai cru que mon heure était venue, mais l'Empereur n'était visiblement pas encore prêt à se passer de mes services. »
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: « À ce moment-là, comme nos officiers supérieurs étaient tombés au combat, j'ai pris le commandement et j'ai lancé une charge à la baïonnette. Nous avons fait payer aux xénos le prix du sang, mais... j'ignore comment la bataille s'est terminée, je n'ai aucun souvenir de ce qu'il s'est passé ensuite. Je suis revenu à moi ici, dans ce lieu infâme, désarmé et aux portes de la mort. J'ai cru que mon heure était venue, mais l'Empereur n'était visiblement pas encore prêt à se passer de mes services. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Zu diesem Zeitpunkt war unser befehlshabender Offizier bereits gefallen, also führte ich meine Leute bei einem Bajonettangriff an. Wir erteilten den Xenos eine blutige Lektion, und dann ... Ich habe an das Ende der Schlacht keine Erinnerung mehr. Ich erlangte das Bewusstsein an diesem üblen Ort wieder, entwaffnet und dem Tode nah. Ich dachte, ich würde sterben, doch die Zeit, dass der Imperator mich aus Seinem Dienst entlässt, war noch nicht gekommen."
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: "Zu diesem Zeitpunkt war unser befehlshabender Offizier bereits gefallen, also führte ich meine Leute bei einem Bajonettangriff an. Wir erteilten den Xenos eine blutige Lektion, und dann ... Ich habe an das Ende der Schlacht keine Erinnerung mehr. Ich erlangte das Bewusstsein an diesem üblen Ort wieder, entwaffnet und dem Tode nah. Ich dachte, ich würde sterben, doch die Zeit, dass der Imperator mich aus Seinem Dient entlässt, war noch nicht gekommen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "O an geldiğinde üstlerim zaten ölmüştü, ben de askerlere süngü hücumunda önderlik ettim. Zenolara kanla yazılmış bir ders verdik. Sonraysa... Savaşın nasıl bittiğini hatırlamıyorum. Kendime geldiğimde bu iğrenç yerdeydim, silahımsızdım ve ölümün eşiğindeydim. Öleceğimi sandım İmparator henüz hizmetinden azat etmeye niyetli değil."
languages.original_text: "By that time, our superior officers had already fallen, so I led my people in a bayonet charge. We taught the xenos a lesson in blood, and then... I have no memory of how the battle ended. I came to consciousness in this foul place, disarmed and on the verge of death. I thought I'd die, but it was not yet time for the Emperor to release me from His service."

traits.locale_text: "O ana dek üst subaylarım zaten düşmüştü, ben de askerleri süngü hücumuna yönlendirdim. Zenolara kanla yazılmış bir ders verdik ve sonra... Savaşın nasıl bittiğini hatırlamıyorum. Kendime geldiğimde bu iğrenç yerdeydim, silahım yoktu ve ölümün eşiğindeydim. Öleceğimi sanmıştım ama İmparator'un beni henüz hizmetinden azat etme vakti gelmemiş."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
